channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: “Great Unified Microscope” reveals micro and nano worlds in a single view

item.title: Daily music listening linked to big drop in dementia risk
item.description: Older adults who regularly listen to or play music appear to have significantly lower risks of dementia and cognitive decline. The data suggests that ...

item.title: Scientists uncover a surprising protein that heals stubborn wounds
item.description: Researchers have uncovered that SerpinB3, typically linked to severe cancers, is also a key player in natural wound healing. The protein drives skin c...

item.title: A tiny ancient virus reveals secrets that could help fight superbugs

item.title: The hidden brain bias that makes some lies so convincing
item.description: People are more likely to believe lies when there’s the possibility of a reward. Neuroimaging shows that the brain shifts into reward or risk mode dep...
